snippet.title: Cris Tales - 8 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description: Check out some exclusive gameplay of Cris Tales, a stylish time-travel RPG where the left side of the screen is always in the past and the right side is always in the future from developers Dreams Uncorporated and SYCK, debuted during IGN's Summer of Gaming.
